original_title: Squatting the Palace: An Installation By Kiki Smith In Venice
overview: American artist Kiki Smith is renowned for print and sculptural works that explore issues of feminism and the female body. This documentary offers a glimpse into Smith's artistic process as she creates a series of prints, sculptures, and furniture for an eight-room art installation called "Homespun Tales: Stories of Domestic Occupation," which was exhibited in Venice, Italy, as part of the 2005 Venice Biennale.
title: Squatting the Palace: An Installation By Kiki Smith In Venice
